This is an [R Markdown website](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com/rmarkdown_websites.html). 
The source can be found [on GitHub <i class="fa fa-github"></i>](https://github.com/stevenbedrick/data-vis-labs-2020).

These labs are based entirely on [Alison Hill's](https://alison.rbind.io) labs from [the 2018 course](https://apreshill.github.io/data-vis-labs-2018/). I have made some minor updates, modifications, and additions, but the authorship is hers.

The link to this year's labs is here:

<https://stevenbedrick.github.io/data-vis-labs-2020/>

The full course syllabus is available here: [CS631: Principles & Practice of Data Visualization (Spring 2020)](http://cslu.ohsu.edu/~bedricks/courses/cs631/).

Course Director: Dr. Steven Bedrick
